resources.string: There are no accounts setup on this phone.
Click Next to establish the connection between Chrome and this phone.
(Note: Chrome to Phone does not currently support Google Apps accounts).
If you no longer want to send links to this phone, press the button below.
Error: Google Apps accounts not supported.
Please set your link action preference:

Set-up complete. Your phone is now connected and ready to receive links from Chrome.

If you have not already done so, you now need to install the Chrome Extension by visiting the Chrome Extension gallery on your desktop at
http://chrome.google.com/extensions/ and searching for "Chrome to Phone".
Your phone is connected to Chrome using this account:

Chrome to Phone lets you easily share links, maps, and currently selected phone numbers and text between your computer and your phone.

You need to install the Chrome browser extension on your computer to send links to your phone. The browser extension can be downloaded from the Chrome extension gallery at http://chrome.google.com/extensions/. Simply search for "Chrome to Phone".

There are just 3 simple steps to complete the set up on your phone:

1. Choose the Google Account to use.
2. Connect your Chrome and your phone.
3. Set your link action preference.

By using this application, you agree to the
Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Chrome to Phone lets you easily share links, maps, and currently selected phone numbers and text between your computer and your phone.

It is comprised of two components: an Android application and a Chrome browser extension. The browser extension can be downloaded from the Chrome extension gallery at http://chrome.google.com/extensions/

Once the Chrome extension is installed on your computer, you can connect your Android phone.

You can choose whether links sent from your phone are automatically opened by the appropriate application or left as messages in the status bar which you can action manually.

By using this application, you agree to the
Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
